price: 25. Dis : « Je ne sais si ce dont vous êtes menacés est imminent, ou si mon Seigneur lui a fixé un terme différé.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tūʿadūna am yajʿalu lahu rabbī amadan
